title: The Sedevacantist Monk and his YouTube Shroud of Turin video
post:
Dan, Dan, Dan
They have it all wrong, Pope John Paul was murdered by Al Pacino in Godfather III.
As a matter of fact there was a lot of strange things going on at the Vatican that surfaced later. There was an enormous scandal involving the Vatican Bank and Banco Ambrosiano in Venice. The president of the bank, Roberto Calvi,  was found hanging from the Black Friars Bridge in London. The press had dubbed him “God’s Banker” because of his Vatican ties.There are some who doubt the suicide (legitimately). Maybe most are doubters.
The claim that Pope John I was murdered by Mason’s and Communists is right-wing blather. As a matter of fact, Calvi was connected to Propaganda Due a Masonic lodge. However, there is no reasonable explanation of why the Communists would be interested in him. He might very well have carried out John XXIII’s “opening to the left.” The hot rumor which made it into a book was that he intended to loosen doctrinal restrictions on birth control. For insiders in the Vatican, that and his apparent unhappiness with the Vatican Bank was supposed to be too much.
Calvi was also tied to a redevelopment of railroad yards in a project in Manhattan called “Lincoln West.” Then Assemblyman Jerrold Nadler (now a congressman and a former client) was told by Trump that the Vatican was behind the deal. Jerry wasn’t impressed. That deal was later done with Vatican money but Trump was still in the middle of it. Jerry never supported it.
author: John Klotz

title: The Sedevacantist Monk and his YouTube Shroud of Turin video
post:
JK’s comments relate to the scandals that came to light following death of Pope JP I, no doubt all good grist for the likes of the Sedevacantists.  However we’ve seen this assertion of theirs before (no true pope since Pius XII).  It’s essentially an ultra-conservative reaction against the reforms of Vatican Council II.  Le Febre(?) had his own version of the same, and we even had several cells and variations of it here in faraway NZ.  
Nobody has ever managed to explain to me how they explain away the Petrine text in Matthew 16:18-20 “Tu es Petrus …”  … ‘And the gates of the underworld can never hold out against it’ (JB).  Perhaps they imagine themselves to be the sole remnant of Israel, or maybe they just wannabe pope themselves!
author: daveb of wellington nz

According to Dan there is only two of them in their Monastery (?!) But they are not alone in their far right nuttiness. See  http://www.romancatholicism.org/101-benedict.htm
There are other pages so vile that I won’t site them that couple this kind of attack with virulent, undisguised anti-Semitism. One of them had a video of a priest (somewhere in Middle Europe (if not Middle Earth) leading a procession that was desecrating a Menorah.
Frankly, after reading 101 Heresies attributed to Benedict, I had a glint of admiration for the man. He was a leading liberal theologian at Vatican II, but after runs with the German Red brigade as a college Chaplain he flipped somewhat. You might find my blog on him of interest: http://open.salon.com/blog/jc_klotz/2010/04/04/benedictus_agonistes
